To generate network connectivity maps for QA, we use a published parcellation, the 
"Nonlinear MNI152 Volume Space 7 Network Liberal Mask" from

Yeo BT, Krienen FM, Sepulcre J, Sabuncu MR, Lashkari D, Hollinshead M, Roffman JL, 
Smoller JW, Zollei L., Polimeni JR, Fischl B, Liu H, Buckner RL. The organization 
of the human cerebral cortex estimated by intrinsic functional connectivity. J 
Neurophysiol 106(3):1125-65, 2011. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3174820/

Described here:
https://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/fswiki/CorticalParcellation_Yeo2011

And available here (as of 20190529):
ftp://surfer.nmr.mgh.harvard.edu/pub/data/Yeo_JNeurophysiol11_MNI152.zip

Only the needed files are retained in this repository.
